quote: I owe a lot of the success I've had in real estate to my professional training in the culinary world.
why_clipworthy: Shows how skills from one industry can be transferred to another.
suggested_hook: How a top REALTOR used his chef skills to dominate real estate.

quote: We realized that there was so many opportunities that were already acquired by the agents that were just sitting in their database.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the untapped potential in existing databases.
suggested_hook: Are you sitting on a goldmine of leads without realizing it?
